Package com.c05mic.timer

Class Timer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.c05mic.timer.Timer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExampleTimer
    public abstract class Timer
extends java.lang.Object
    A abstract timer utility class, that supports pause and resume. Can be used either as a normal timer or a countdown timer.
    Author:
    Sridhar Sundar Raman

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int DURATION_INFINITY  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Timer()
      Default constructor which sets the interval to 1000 ms (1s) and the duration to DURATION_INFINITY
      Timer​(long interval, long duration)

      Stops the timer.
      void destroy()
      Destroys the timer
      long getElapsedTime()  
      long getRemainingTime()  
      boolean isRunning()  
      static Timer of​(java.lang.Runnable tick)
      Creates a timer which runs once per second indefinitely
      static Timer of​(java.lang.Runnable tick, long interval, long duration)
      Creates a timer which runs with specified period and duration
      static Timer of​(java.lang.Runnable tick, java.lang.Runnable finish, long interval, long duration)
      Creates a timer which runs with specified period and duration and calls finish after finishing
      protected abstract void onFinish()
      This method is called once the timer has run for the specified duration.
      protected abstract void onTick()
      This method is called periodically with the interval set as the delay between subsequent calls.
      void pause()
      Paused the timer.
      void start()
      Starts or resumes the timer.

    • Field Detail

      • DURATION_INFINITY

        public static final int DURATION_INFINITY
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Timer

        public Timer()
        Default constructor which sets the interval to 1000 ms (1s) and the duration to DURATION_INFINITY

      • Timer

        public Timer​(long interval,
             long duration)
        Parameters:
        interval - The time gap between each tick in millis.
        duration - The period in millis for which the timer should run. Set it to Timer#DURATION_INFINITY if the timer has to run indefinitely.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts or resumes the timer. If the timer was already running, this call is ignored.

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Paused the timer. If the timer is not running, this call is ignored.

      • onTick

        protected abstract void onTick()
        This method is called periodically with the interval set as the delay between subsequent calls.

      • onFinish

        protected abstract void onFinish()
        This method is called once the timer has run for the specified duration. If the duration was set as infinity, then this method is never called.

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        Stops the timer. If the timer is not running, then this call does nothing.

      • getElapsedTime

        public long getElapsedTime()
        Returns:
        the elapsed time (in millis) since the start of the timer.

      • getRemainingTime

        public long getRemainingTime()
        Returns:
        the time remaining (in millis) for the timer to stop. If the duration was set to Timer#DURATION_INFINITY, then -1 is returned.

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        Returns:
        true if the timer is currently running, and false otherwise.

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Destroys the timer

      • of

        public static Timer of​(java.lang.Runnable tick)
        Creates a timer which runs once per second indefinitely
        Parameters:
        tick - action
        Returns:
        a new timer

      • of

        public static Timer of​(java.lang.Runnable tick,
                       long interval,
                       long duration)
        Creates a timer which runs with specified period and duration
        Parameters:
        tick - action
        interval - interval
        duration - duration
        Returns:
        a new timer

      • of

        public static Timer of​(java.lang.Runnable tick,
                       java.lang.Runnable finish,
                       long interval,
                       long duration)
        Creates a timer which runs with specified period and duration and calls finish after finishing
        Parameters:
        tick - run loop
        finish - finish action
        interval - interval
        duration - duration
        Returns:
        a new timer
